author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-OTI Receives New Purchase Order Of 2,000 Cashless Payment Systems From Japan
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - On Track Innovations Ltd:
* OTI RECEIVES A NEW PURCHASE ORDER OF 2,000 CASHLESS PAYMENT SYSTEMS FROM JAPAN
* ON TRACK INNOVATIONS LTD - ‍EXPECTS PURCHASE ORDER TO BE DELIVERED IN BOTH FIRST AND Q2 OF 2018​
* ON TRACK INNOVATIONS LTD - ‍TERMS OF CONTRACT CANNOT BE DISCLOSED​
* ON TRACK INNOVATIONS LTD - ‍WILL RECOGNIZE A ONE-TIME SALE, FOLLOWED BY A HIGH-MARGIN, RECURRING REVENUE STREAM OVER LONG-TERM RELATED TO ORDER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
